properties.name: Mary Brown's Washroom
properties.notes: Washrooms are clean, easily accessible, no stairs, frequent potholes in area.

properties.name: Rexall Washroom
properties.notes: Frequently OUT OF ORDER, employee only washroom, store entrance at an incline.

properties.name: No Frills Washroom
properties.notes: On the main floor, no stairs, frequently clean, moving vehicles present.

properties.name: Shoppers' Washroom
properties.notes: At the back of the store, no stairs, moving vehicles present.

properties.name: Ghareeb Nawaz Restaruant Washrooms
properties.notes: Not Accessible, has a flight of stairs to washroom
